Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Yitsulila Olwa Yesu Omwana wa Mariam yaboola mbu : “Enywe Abana ba Israel esie endi Omurumwa wa Nyasaye khwinywe, efuchilila obwatoto bwendi nabo okhurula mutaurati, nende okhubalachilisia Omurumwa unondakhwo ulangwa mbu Ahmed, olwa yabeetsela baboola mbu buno nobulosi bulolekha
Ne wina wetsimbi muno, okhushilakhwo ulia uchishila Nyasaye abubeyi, naye alangungwa mubusalamu ne Nyasaye shalunjisinjia Abandu ababii tawe
Benyanga okhusumia obulafu bwa Nyasaye ne minwa chiabu, ne Nyasaye alatinyia abulafu bubwe kata abakhayi nibafimba
Niye owaruma Omurumwa wuwe nende obulunjifu nende idini ya toto ilolekhane habulafu okhushila tsi dini thindi, kata Abatsokaasi nibafimba
Enywe Abasuubili, abamanyiekhwo inganga yitsa okhubahonia nende eshinyasio eshilulu
Musubilenje Nyasaye nende Omurumwa wuwe, ne mukhalabanenje khunjila ya Nyasaye khu miandu chienyu nende emioyo chienyu ako ni amalayi khwinywe nikaba mbu mwakhamanya
Alabaleshela ebionoono bienyu, ne alabenjisia mwikulu mumikunda chiburanga hasi wachio emialo nende eshimenyo eshilayi mumukunda kwa Eden, okho nikhwo okhubura okhukhongo
Ne eshindi shibachamisia, obukhoonyi okhurula khu Nyasaye nende obushili buli hambi, ne suubisia Abasuubili

Enywe Abasubili mube abahabini ba Nyasaye, Shinga Yesu yareeba abechi bebe, mbu niwina umuhabini wanje khu Nyasaye ? abechi be nibaboola mbu Efwe khuli abahabini ba Nyasaye” Mana nikusuubila omukanda okhurula mubana ba Israil, ne okundi nikukhaya, kho nikhukhoonya kulia okwasuubila khubasuku bakwo, nikushila
